alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 4:22PM CDT until May 25 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Chikaskia River near Corbin affecting Sumner County. For the Chikaskia River...including Corbin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chikaskia River near Corbin. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying areas can be expected, especially along the right bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:16 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 10.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Chikaskia River Corbin 10.0 9.7 Tue 4 pm CDT 6.4 3.3 3.0 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
